characterInfo.Appears in: Words of Radiance, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription:
Venli is the sister of Eshonai. She is one of the leading Parshendi scholars and performs this task while in nimbleform, as methods for attaining scholarform have been lost.
Venli knows much about the forms, and much of her research is held only in her head.
Her mother seems to suffer from some kind of dementia.
